definition: Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
seven/7
star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount
Ursa Major/Great Bear/Big Dipper
Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
seven-spotted ladybug (Coccinella septempunctata)

sentences.english: I went to the seven star park and got on the seven star rock.
sentences.chinese: 在導遊的帶領下，我去了七星公園和七星巖上。

sentences.english: I went to the seven star park and got on the seven star rock.
sentences.chinese: 在導遊的帶領下，我去了七星公園和七星巖上。

sentences.english: The beach scene right outside of Hualian city.
These results suggested that the otolith of this species is a good character of age-determination.
sentences.chinese: 從此等結果顯示七星魚的耳石爲良好的年齡形質。

sentences.english: Zhaoqing, a tourist city with long Folk art history, is rich in colorful culture, frequent cultural exchange.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊文化節的民族歌舞演出地點定在七星巖牌坊廣場。

sentences.english: The Big Dipper actually belongs to the constellation Ursa Major, otherwise known as the Big Bear.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，北斗七星歸屬大熊星座，或成爲大熊。

sentences.english: The ladybird is red and black.
How do you do My name's Tom Johnson, sales manager of the Seven-Star Trade Company.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是湯姆約翰遜，七星貿易公司銷售部經理。

sentences.english: The Seven-star scenic spot is the typical representative of combination of natural and human landscapes in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 桂林七星景區是自然與人文景觀相結合的典型代表。

sentences.english: To build a parking lot between Wu-Cheng Bridge and Seven-Star Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 武前橋到七星橋之間蓋成停車場。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Big Dipper was hidden by a monster suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 上古時代，天上的北斗七星突然被怪物藏匿起來。

sentences.english: Can you see the great dipper ?
Many a night I saw the Pleiads, rising thro' the mellow shade.
sentences.chinese: 許多夜晚我仰望七星，帶着柔和的陰影升起。

sentences.english: Ogle with little horse in Seven Star Park.
sentences.chinese: 與七星公園的馬兒“眉目傳情”。

sentences.english: Tree and stars, on flag no more.
sentences.chinese: 剛鐸的旗幟，不見白樹與七星。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
Aoki (Japanese surname)
the seven planets of premodern astronomy (the Sun, the Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn)
black/mysterious
constellation (arch., now 星座)/one of the 28 constellations of traditional Chinese astronomy and astrology/motion of stars since one's birth (predetermining one's fate in astrology)
Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity/aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝
dark/hell/netherworld/hades
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
beta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
stars

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
